name: fishing-rod
effect: Allows the player to fish for Pokémon.
short_effect: Allows the player to fish for Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A Fishing Rod made by Captain Lana. Cast a line over piles of underwater rocks to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A fishing rod made by Captain Lana. Cast a line over piles of underwater rocks to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A fishing rod made by Captain Lana. Cast a line over piles of underwater rocks to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
